name: ClothingSizeConverter
0:
”Alexa, ask clothing sizes about shoe size ten”
”Alexa, ask clothing sizes about clothing size fourteen”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: clothing sizes
des: Given a shoe or clothing size from UK or Europe, gives its US (and UK or Europe) equivalent. Useful when ordering things from abroad - what's a size 33, anyway?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
